We apologize for the ad-hoc nature of this new knowledge base.


We are working on mitigating an attack on our original knowledge base but wanted to get up the content in the meantime.

We will be pushing updates all week to implement better templates and search.

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to email us at support@myetherwallet.com in the meantime.

Thank you for your patience.
